statements: SELECT * FROM music_festivals WHERE festival_location = 'New York';
SELECT festival_name, start_date, genre FROM music_festivals WHERE genre = 'Rock';
SELECT festival_name, festival_location, start_date, end_date FROM music_festivals WHERE start_date >= '2021-09-01';
SELECT DISTINCT genre FROM music_festivals;
SELECT festival_name, lineup FROM music_festivals WHERE festival_location = 'California' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM music_festivals WHERE genre = 'Rock' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT festival_name, festival_location, start_date, end_date, lineup FROM music_festivals WHERE genre = 'Pop' ORDER BY festival_location ASC;
SELECT festival_name, festival_location, start_date, end_date FROM music_festivals WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-07-01' AND '2022-08-31' ORDER BY festival_name ASC;
SELECT festival_id, festival_name, festival_location, genre FROM music_festivals WHERE festival_location LIKE '%York%' ORDER BY festival_id DESC;
SELECT festival_id, festival_name, festival_location, start_date, end_date, genre, lineup FROM music_festivals WHERE genre = 'EDM' OR genre = 'Hip-Hop' ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT festival_name, festival_date, genre, city FROM upcoming_music_festivals;
SELECT * FROM upcoming_music_festivals WHERE genre = 'Rock';
SELECT festival_id, festival_name, city FROM upcoming_music_festivals ORDER BY festival_date DESC;
SELECT artist_name, performance_date, performance_time FROM artist_lineups WHERE genre = 'Pop' ORDER BY performance_date, performance_time;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_festivals FROM upcoming_music_festivals;
SELECT * FROM upcoming_music_festivals WHERE genre = 'Rock' ORDER BY festival_date DESC;
SELECT festival_name, city, festival_date, genre FROM upcoming_music_festivals WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY festival_date ASC;

SELECT lineup_id, artist_name, festival_name, performance_date, performance_time FROM artist_lineups INNER JOIN upcoming_music_festivals ON artist_lineups.festival_id = upcoming_music_festivals.festival_id WHERE genre = 'Pop' ORDER BY performance_date ASC, performance_time ASC;
SELECT festival_name, city, festival_date, genre FROM upcoming_music_festivals WHERE festival_date BETWEEN '2022-08-01' AND '2023-02-28' ORDER BY city ASC;
SELECT * FROM artist_lineups WHERE genre = 'Electronic' ORDER BY performance_date DESC, performance_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM music_festivals;
SELECT festival_name, location, festival_date FROM music_festivals;
SELECT festival_name, location FROM music_festivals WHERE festival_date = '2022-07-15';
SELECT artist_name, genre_name FROM artist_lineups JOIN music_genres ON artist_lineups.genre_id = music_genres.genre_id;
SELECT artist_name, festival_name FROM artist_lineups JOIN music_festivals ON artist_lineups.festival_id = music_festivals.festival_id ORDER BY artist_name DESC;
SELECT festival_name, festival_date, location FROM music_festivals WHERE festival_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT festival_name, location FROM music_festivals WHERE location LIKE '%California%';

SELECT festival_name, artist_name, genre_name FROM music_festivals INNER JOIN artist_lineups ON music_festivals.festival_id = artist_lineups.festival_id INNER JOIN music_genres ON artist_lineups.genre_id = music_genres.genre_id;
SELECT * FROM music_festivals WHERE festival_date BETWEEN '2022-07-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT festival_name, festival_date FROM music_festivals ORDER BY festival_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM festivals;
SELECT festival_name, festival_date FROM festivals WHERE location='New York';
SELECT artist_name, genre_name FROM artists JOIN genres ON artists.genre_id = genres.genre_id;
SELECT festival_id, festival_name FROM festivals ORDER BY festival_date DESC;
SELECT festival_name, artist_name FROM festivals JOIN festival_lineup ON festivals.festival_id = festival_lineup.festival_id JOIN artists ON festival_lineup.artist_id = artists.artist_id;
SELECT festival_name, festival_date, location FROM festivals WHERE festival_date > '2022-01-01' AND location = 'New York' ORDER BY festival_date DESC;
SELECT artists.artist_name, genres.genre_name FROM artists INNER JOIN genres ON artists.genre_id = genres.genre_id WHERE genres.genre_name = 'Rock' ORDER BY artists.artist_name ASC;

SELECT festival_name, artist_name FROM festivals JOIN festival_lineup ON festivals.festival_id = festival_lineup.festival_id JOIN artists ON festival_lineup.artist_id = artists.artist_id WHERE festival_date BETWEEN '2022-05-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY festival_name ASC;

SELECT festival_name, COUNT(artist_id) AS total_artists FROM festivals JOIN festival_lineup ON festivals.festival_id = festival_lineup.festival_id GROUP BY festival_name HAVING total_artists > 3 ORDER BY total_artists DESC;

SELECT festival_name, location, COUNT(artist_id) AS total_artists FROM festivals JOIN festival_lineup ON festivals.festival_id = festival_lineup.festival_id GROUP BY festival_name, location ORDER BY location, festival_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM MusicFestivals;
SELECT festival_name, festival_location FROM MusicFestivals WHERE festival_id = 3;
SELECT festival_name, COUNT(*) AS total_genres FROM FestivalGenres JOIN MusicFestivals ON FestivalGenres.festival_id = MusicFestivals.festival_id GROUP BY festival_name;
SELECT artist_name FROM Artists WHERE artist_id < 5 ORDER BY artist_name DESC;

SELECT festival_name, festival_location, artist_name FROM MusicFestivals JOIN FestivalArtists ON MusicFestivals.festival_id = FestivalArtists.festival_id JOIN Artists ON FestivalArtists.artist_id = Artists.artist_id WHERE festival_location = 'California';
SELECT * FROM Genres WHERE genre_name = 'Rock';
SELECT festival_name, festival_location FROM MusicFestivals WHERE festival_location = 'California';
SELECT festival_name, artist_name, time_slot FROM FestivalArtists INNER JOIN Artists ON FestivalArtists.artist_id = Artists.artist_id WHERE time_slot >= '2022-05-01';

SELECT festival_name, genre_name FROM MusicFestivals INNER JOIN FestivalGenres ON MusicFestivals.festival_id = FestivalGenres.festival_id INNER JOIN Genres ON FestivalGenres.genre_id = Genres.genre_id WHERE festival_name LIKE '%fest%' AND genre_name = 'Pop';
SELECT artist_name, COUNT(festival_id) AS festival_count FROM FestivalArtists INNER JOIN Artists ON FestivalArtists.artist_id = Artists.artist_id GROUP BY artist_name HAVING COUNT(festival_id) > 2;
